-- | A haskell binding to cracklib

--   A haskell binding to cracklib
@package crack
@version 0.1


-- | C interface to cracklib
module Text.Crack.Base
c_fascist_check :: CString -> CString -> IO CString


-- | Haskell binding to cracklib
module Text.Crack

-- | Check a password Returns Right () if the password is good, or Left
--   String where the string is a message explaining the problems with the
--   password.
crack :: String -> String -> Either String ()
